remarks: The span of a singleton is a subspace (frequently used special case of ~ lspcl ).  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2014.)
statement:
lspval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspval.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lspval.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsncl $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. S ) $.
